1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Aman's son in law wishes to work in a foreign country but he doesn't have the requisite money for traveling to abroad. Then he forces his wife for money to go abroad but when she asks her mother for it. She puts in stake the happiness of her son by playing with the lives of her daughter in law.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Shaukat convinces Sumbhal to marry again. This time she marries Danish, who's mother only cares about money and thinks that money is respect.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Aman treats her new daughter-in-law as a slave. Meanwhile, Danish tries several times to call Sumbhal to his room. He tells her that he loves her and that she is his wife.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Sumbhal in depression tries to commit suicide but realizes that she is also committing a sin so fails.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Hamid, mad at his wife goes to Aman's house to complain about Noreen, there he finds Sumbhal. Hamid offers to help Sumbhal but she refuses.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Sumbhal finds a way to call her father but Noreen catches her. Shaukat gets worried and gets into Aman's house and takes Sumbhal back to his house.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Shaukat in jail, finds out that Sumbhal is not in his home. Danish swears by holding the Quran that Sumbhal is not pregnant.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Aman chooses Naazreen to be Danish's third wife. Naazreen is a disabled girl due to polio.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Shaukat dies in prison, and his friend comes to Aman's house to inform Sumbhal of her father's death.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Sumbhal still sad about her father, remembers some memories she had with him.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Nazreen and her father in law find out the truth about Aman and Danish.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Naazreen demands her 70 million rupees back. Meanwhile, Naazreen tries to help Sumbhal into dealing with Aman and Danish.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Danish signs a 70 million rupees check to Naazreen. Now the check will bounce 3 times and if Danish is not able to give the requisite money, Danish will be imprisoned.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Danish takes Sumbhal out for dinner. Danish forces Sumbhal to tell him that which papers did Naazreen make Aman sign?

15.title: Last Episode
15.plot: The police imprisons Danish. Naazreen makes a deal with Danish that if he divorces Sumbhal, she could take him out of jail.

imdb.plot outline: Aman's son-in-law wishes to work in a foreign country but he doesn't have the requisite money for traveling to abroad. Then he forces his wife for money to go abroad but when she asks her mother for it. She puts in stake the happiness of her son by playing with the lives of her daughter in law.
imdb.title: Aise Jalay Jiya
plot: Aman's son-in-law wishes to work in a foreign country but he doesn't have the requisite money for traveling to abroad. Then he forces his wife for money to go abroad but when she asks her mother for it. She puts in stake the happiness of her son by playing with the lives of her daughter in law.::Abdullah Hassan
synopsis:
"Aise Jalay Jiya" is a story about a selfish woman name Aman (played by Samina Ahmad). She always sacrifices the happiness of her children for her desire. Aman has one daughter (Noreen) and one son (Danish) who have married. Aman's son in law (Hamid) wishes to work in a foreign country but he doesn't have the requisite money for traveling to abroad. Then he forces his wife (Noreen) for money to go abroad but when she asks her mother (Aman) for it. She puts in stake the happiness of her son by playing with the lives of her daughter in law (Gana). Two questions arrive; Is Aman saves the marriage of her daughter? And what happens to her family? To find out, watch "Aise Jalay Jiya" on HUM Classics. Sumbhal is a decent girl, whose husband (Sarwat) died in an accident. Danish (played by Imran Aslam) is an evil man who always listens to her mother, including beating your wife. Aman (played by Samina Ahmad) is a materialistic woman who sacrifices the happiness of her children for her own desire. Naazreen (played by Kaif Ghazvani) is smart and intelligent young woman who is also married to Danish (played by Imran Aslam).
She always fights for the rights of women and helped Sumbhal into dealing with people like Aman and Danish. Shaukat (played by Behroze Sabzwari) is a retired old man who promised Aman of giving her a 10 million cash. He already gave her the check but was not able to check the cash so the check bounced three times and Shaukat was imprisoned. Later he had a heart attack and died in prison.
